title: Pixel 4a cannot app
content:
Pixel 4a-why I cannot open the outlook to see my emails but I can open the appointment 
When I click the outlook using my phone Pixel 4a, it show the mail page for 1s and close the app.   But when I want to check my appointment, it work well.
I have updated to the Android 11, I also updated the outlook.   I have restarted my mobile.
i try setting, app and notification and open the outlook and force stop.  But still cannot open.
Do you have any solution.
